getAzimuth().Description: Returns the azimuth of the satellite in degrees. The azimuth can vary between 0 and 360.
getAzimuth().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

Returns: true if the satellite was used to compute the most recent fix.
usedInFix().Description: Returns true if the satellite was used by the GPS engine when calculating the most recent GPS fix.
usedInFix().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

getPrn().Description: Returns the PRN (pseudo-random number) for the satellite.
getPrn().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

Returns: true if the satellite has ephemeris data
hasEphemeris().Description: Returns true if the GPS engine has ephemeris data for the satellite.
hasEphemeris().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

Returns: true if the satellite has almanac data
hasAlmanac().Description: Returns true if the GPS engine has almanac data for the satellite.
hasAlmanac().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

getSnr().Description: Returns the signal to noise ratio for the satellite.
getSnr().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

getElevation().Description: Returns the elevation of the satellite in degrees. The elevation can vary between 0 and 90.
getElevation().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

ClassDesc: use @B_android#location#GnssStatus_E@ and @B_android#location#GnssStatus#Callback_E@. This class represents the current state of a GPS satellite. This class is used in conjunction with the @B_android#location#GpsStatus_E@ class.
